Array
(
    [0] => Array
        (
            [id] => 1
            [id_user] => 1
            [nama_komentar] => Aninda Safira Wicaksana
            [isi_komentar] => Alhamdulilah, selamat atas pernikahan kalian. Semoga pernikahan kalian dilimpahi oleh cinta, kebaikan dan kebahagiaan. Jazakallahu khairan khatira.. 😊😊😇
            [created_at] => 2020-08-23 22:10:31
            [updated_at] => 2020-08-23 17:02:44
        )

    [1] => Array
        (
            [id] => 2
            [id_user] => 1
            [nama_komentar] => Raisa Andriana
            [isi_komentar] => Selamat menikah sahabatku, ‘Barakallahu lakum wa baraka alaikum’ 
            [created_at] => 2020-08-22 22:12:45
            [updated_at] => 2020-08-22 01:17:42
        )

    [2] => Array
        (
            [id] => 3
            [id_user] => 1
            [nama_komentar] => Anisa Rahma
            [isi_komentar] => Alhamdulillah.. Selamat ya. Semoga Allah Swt selalu melimpahkan rahmatNya untuk pernikahan kalian.
            [created_at] => 2020-08-20 22:14:44
            [updated_at] => 2020-08-22 01:18:37
        )

    [3] => Array
        (
            [id] => 4
            [id_user] => 1
            [nama_komentar] => Dinda Hauw
            [isi_komentar] => MasyaAllah.. Selamat buat kalian berdua 🥰😘 Barakallah
            [created_at] => 2020-08-22 22:32:50
            [updated_at] => 2020-08-22 01:18:20
        )

    [4] => Array
        (
            [id] => 5
            [id_user] => 1
            [nama_komentar] => Citra Kirana
            [isi_komentar] => Baarakallahu laka wa baaraka ‘alaika wa jama’a bainakumaa fii khaiir.

Semoga Allah memberikan keberkahan untukmu dan atasmu, serta semoga Dia mengumpulkan di antara kalian berdua dalam kebaikan. 

🤲🤲🤗🤗
            [created_at] => 2020-07-26 23:00:41
            [updated_at] => 2020-07-26 23:00:41
        )

    [5] => Array
        (
            [id] => 6
            [id_user] => 1
            [nama_komentar] => Nissya Sabyan
            [isi_komentar] => Semoga pernikahan kalian langgeng dan selalu dinaungi petunjuk Allah dalam setiap langkah.. Aamiin 😘😘
            [created_at] => 2020-07-26 23:03:18
            [updated_at] => 2020-07-26 23:03:18
        )

)
